BRIEF-Bounty Mining Says Received A Letter From Amaroo Notifying Co Of Event Of Default

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 20, 2019 17:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bounty Mining Says Received A Letter From Amaroo Notifying Co Of Event Of Default Sept 20 (Reuters) - Bounty Mining Ltd : * UPDATES ON LOAN FACILITY AGREEMENT WITH MAJOR SHAREHOLDER AMAROO BLACKDOWN INVESTMENTS, LLC * RECEIVED A LETTER FROM AMAROO NOTIFYING BOUNTY OF EVENT OF DEFAULT AND NOTING BOUNTY'S REQUEST FOR A WAIVER * LETTER CONFIRMS THAT AMAROO EXPECTS TO RESPOND SOMETIME DURING WEEK COMMENCING 23 SEPTEMBER 2019 * ON SEPT 16, PARTIES DETERMINED BOUNTY HAD NOT MET MONTHLY FREE CASH FLOW COVENANT REGARDING LOAN AGREEMENT
